title: Replace TinyMCE with Quill editor in blog management
scope: Remove TinyMCE usage from the blog management editor.
Implement Quill as the rich text editor without API keys.
Preserve create/update blog post behavior with HTML content.
acceptance_criteria: Blog management editor loads without API keys or external scripts.
Create and update actions preserve rich text HTML content.
No runtime errors when opening or saving blog posts.
risk_notes: HTML output differences between editors could affect styling.
Toolbar configuration may limit formatting compared to TinyMCE.
rollback_plan: Remove `quill` dependency if rollback is required.
